m_szDocTitle: One Reason Tesla (TSLA) Stock Is Trading in the Red - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet One Reason Tesla (TSLA) Stock Is Trading in the Red By Kurumi Fukushima | 05/18/15 - 10:41 AM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Shares of Tesla Motors Inc  ( TSLA - Get Report ) are lower by 0.31% to $248.08 in late morning trading Monday, after analysts at CLSA issued a negative note this morning saying challenges in China remain for the electric car maker. Following the firm's checks in China, CLSA found that Tesla's sales pace has not improved despite its strategy shift. Analysts said inventories in China remain elevated.
